title: I'm not one to normally say this, but they need to put some freakin' clothes on Janna
body:
Her classic skin is her in her underwear yet we can't get a pool party Katarina or sivir because "we don't want pool party skins to just be girls in bikinis" 

come on this champion is almost nude and it's the basic skin, but we can't get a custom skin of sivir throwing life preservers at people and pay 7 dollars for it?
